LanguageData.Make_DigitalStorage_TerminalChip.label: make terminal chip
LanguageData.Make_DigitalStorage_TerminalChip.descrip: Make a terminal chip that can be implanted into the brain for remote access to the digital storage system.
LanguageData.InstallTerminalChip.label: install terminal chip
LanguageData.InstallTerminalChip.description: Implant a terminal chip in the brain, enabling remote access to the digital storage system.
LanguageData.RemoveTerminalChip.label: remove terminal chip
LanguageData.RemoveTerminalChip.description: Remove the terminal chip from the brain.
